alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Western Alachua; Western Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:29PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Alachua, northwestern Marion and west central Putnam Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 429 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rochelle, or 11 miles southeast of Gainesville, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Interlachen, Melrose, Citra, Hawthorne, Archer, University Of Florida, Rochelle, Melrose Landing and Cross Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Western Alachua; Western Marion; Western Putnam
